UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Tuneable poration: host defense peptides as sequence probes for antimicrobial mechanisms.
Literature.Author: Pfeil MP, Pyne ALB, Losasso V, Ravi J, Lamarre B, Faruqui N, Alkassem H, Hammond K, Judge PJ, Winn M, Martyna GJ, Crain J, Watts A, Hoogenboom BW, Ryadnov MG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>12µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>3µM)
